basic.Peptide Name: SyCPA 63 (thurinsyn; XXD; XXL, lipopeptide; chemically synthetic AMPs20; lactam; XXJ; UCSB1a)
basic.Source: bioinformatic predicted bacterial nonribosomal gene cluster,Bacillus thuringiensisplasmid BMB171, bacteria-derived, natural derivatives
basic.Target Organism: active against B. subtilis 168 1A1 (MIC 4 ug/ml), E. faecium Com15 (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. aureus USA300 (MIC 8 ug/ml), E. coli DH5alpha (MIC 16 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC 10031 (MIC 8 ug/ml), A. baumannii ATCC 17978 (MIC 32 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa PAO1 (MI 16 ug/ml), E. cloacae ATCC 14037 (MIC 64 ug/ml), M. tuberculosis H37RV (MIC 6 ug/ml). This peptide shows the broadest activity spectrum in this family of peptides.
